title: how are you teammates
body: i am a silver 1 player, i usually duo rank with my friends, today i have 2 solo rank games, thats awful. my teammates giveing up after they get 2 ganks, everyone played like a bronze player, thats fine, people make mistakes, but after the game i found my both my and other side  are all gold 3 4 5 players, wtf? actully if i match with all silver and gold 5 4 i think i can carry them at least make the game more fun.all i want to say is bad rank matching system kill this game. BG

replies.body:
My teammates?
What team mates.
Afks, int feeders, greifers. 

All thats fine, even if I report them. Just had a troll ez that afk farmed all game so I was stuck soloing bot.
That time when you get a Jungle that ints on silver elo and he complains about getting bronze 5 in placements , I get alot of those on this server XD feels bad man
